original_text: Jesus returned to his own town. He taught the Jewish people in their meeting room there. The people were very surprised about the things that he taught them. They said to each other, ‘We do not know how this man learned all these things. And we do not know how he does all these powerful things.
korean_text: 고향으로 돌아가사 그들의 회당에서 가르치시니 그들이 놀라 이르되 이 사람의 이 지혜와 이런 능력이 어디서 났느냐

sentences.original_text: Jesus returned to his own town
about the things that he taught them
how this man learned all these things
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람이 어떻게 이 모든 것들을 배웠는지를

sentences.original_text: how he does all these powerful things
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 어떻게 이 모든 강력한 일들을 하는지를
